title: Companion Approval Guide
content: ony Offer to help Baelen Bonecloak when you find him in the middle of the field Find the Mushroom Picker Requirement/s: ?? Karlach + Gale +Wyll + Baelen Bonecloak Underdark - Baelin is trapped in the northwest corner of Underdark, surrounded by Bibberbang. It is closeby to the Myconid Colony. Directly west of it.
